pr_title: CB-9692 getAllRecipes throws NPE if recipes field is empty in request object

timeline.message: CB-9692 getAllRecipes throws NPE if recipes field is empty in request object

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we verify that the result is an empty set?
timeline.author: keyki

replies.bodyText: We can verify, I just wanted to create as minimal unit test as I can to test this use case :D anyway, assert is added
replies.author: sodre90
